rukus.text: Xindao de renmen a! Nimen yao taofa linjin nimen de bu xindao zhe, shi tamen ganjue dao nimen de yanli. Nimen zhidao, an la shi he jingwei zhe zai yiqi de

Dang jiang shi yi zhang jing de shihou, tamen zhong youren shuo:“Zhe zhang jing shi nimen zhong de nage ren gengjia quexin ne?” Zhiyu xindao zhe, na zhang jing shi tamen gengjia quexinle. Tongshi, tamen shi kuaile de
Zhiyu xinzhong you bing zhe, na zhang jing shi tamen wuhui shang jia wuhui, zhi si bu xin
Nandao tamen bu zhidao ma? Tamen meinian shou yi liang ci kaoyan, dan zong shi bu gaihui, ye bu juewu
Dang jiang shi yi zhang jing de shihou, tamen mianmianxiangqu (shuo):“Youren kanjian nimen ma?” Tamen jiu liu zoule. An la yi gaibian tamen de xin, yinwei tamen shi bu lijie de minzhong
Nimen ben zu zhong de shizhe que yi lai jiaohua nimenle, ta bu renxin jian nimen shou tongku, ta kewang nimen de zhengdao, ta ci'ai xinshimen
Ruguo tamen weibei zhengdao, ni shuo:“An la shi neng shi wo manzu de, chu ta wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de. Wo zhi tuo kao ta, ta shi weida de baozuo de zhu.”
